body_html:
Yes, you can use torch.multinomial to sample from a uniform distribution.

However, since the multinomial function is for general purpose sampling, it is slower for standard distributions, such as "uniform" or "log-uniform".
body_text:
Yes, you can use torch.multinomial to sample from a uniform distribution.
However, since the multinomial function is for general purpose sampling, it is slower for standard distributions, such as "uniform" or "log-uniform".
body:
Yes, you can use torch.multinomial to sample from a uniform distribution.

However, since the multinomial function is for general purpose sampling, it is slower for standard distributions, such as "uniform" or "log-uniform".
